Texts.Eng: A punching bag modeled after a Punchy. Haven't you already beaten up the poor things enough?
Texts.Chs: 模仿强悍的拳击袋。你还不够痛打那些可怜的人吗？

Texts.Eng: Ain't much fun shootin' at a still target.
Texts.Chs: 向静止的目标射击没什么意思。

Texts.Eng: Are Punchy sentient? Because that raises a lot of ethical issues...
Texts.Chs: 你有强烈的感觉吗？因为这会引发很多道德问题。。。

Texts.Eng: I certainly feel more comfortable roughing up this sandbag as opposed to an actual Punchy.
Texts.Chs: 我当然觉得用这个沙袋比用一个结实的沙袋更舒服。

Texts.Eng: I think I'd prefer a training dummy...
Texts.Chs: 我想我更喜欢训练假人。。。

Texts.Eng: If it weren't for their little faces, you couldn't tell apart a Punchy from a punching bag at all...
Texts.Chs: 如果不是因为他们的小脸，你根本分不清一个拳头和一个拳击袋。。。

Texts.Eng: Neither Punchy or punching bag bleed at all.
Texts.Chs: 无论是拳击还是拳击袋都不会流血。

Texts.Eng: We SURE this isn't the real deal? ... Alright, then - let's have at it!
Texts.Chs: 我们确定这不是真的交易。。。好吧，那我们开始吧！
